definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: Or writing a fantastic story, painting or sculpting.
sentences.chinese: 或寫一個不錯的故事，繪畫或雕像。

sentences.english: Modern sculpture in Kalasa Citadel ruins.
Statue of the Turkmenbashi, President Niyazov.
sentences.chinese: 尊稱爲“土庫曼巴什”的尼亞佐夫總統的雕像。

sentences.english: This method doesn't work well on resin statues and artificial landscape rocks.
sentences.chinese: 這種方法並不好於樹脂和人造景觀石頭雕像。

sentences.english: There is a bronze statue in the park.
sentences.chinese: 公園裏有一尊青銅色的雕像。

sentences.english: Huge tiger statue in snow, China Beijing Zoo.
sentences.chinese: 雪巨虎雕像，中國北京動物園。

sentences.english: This is the statue of Liu Xie.
We see a statue called "Augustus of Prima Porta".
sentences.chinese: 我們看到一座名爲“第一門的奧古斯都”的雕像。

sentences.english: A lot of my favorite images are of the over-sized Oscar statues.
sentences.chinese: 我所喜愛的相片裏有不少是大碼的奧斯卡雕像。

sentences.english: He looked up at the statue, then at Hiro.
sentences.chinese: 他擡起頭看了看雕像，再轉向希羅。

sentences.english: So with sarcophagi and just like, different stones from the pyramids and statues.
sentences.chinese: 有石棺，還有金字塔和雕像上的各種石頭。

sentences.english: Paolucci dismissed critics who feared the statue might be damaged.
sentences.chinese: 保盧奇駁斥了那些擔心雕像可能會受到損傷的批評。

sentences.english: The figure is from a statue of the king standing in a boat throwing a harpoon.
sentences.chinese: 這件雕像雕刻的是古埃及法老站在一艘船上投擲魚叉。

sentences.english: The noise seemed to BE coming from the room BEhind the statue in front of them.
sentences.chinese: 聲音好像來自他們面前那尊雕像後面的房間裏。

sentences.english: She studied sculpture at Saint Martin's College.
sentences.chinese: 她在聖馬丁學院研究雕像。

sentences.english: No! He resented the old man, so he saws the head off his dad's memorial statue.
sentences.chinese: 沒有，他討厭老爸，甚至鋸掉了父親雕像的腦袋。

definition: icon/iconic/religious image/figure (of Confucius, Buddha, Jesus Christ, the Virgin Mary etc)/CL:張|张[zhang1]
seated image (of a Buddha or saint)
standing image (of a Buddha or saint)
